overview_of_class: This course will survey the history of the United States from the Reconstruction Era to the present. It will focus on several key themes, including the struggle to address social and economic inequality, the expansion of the state, economic achievements and dislocations, and the place of the United States in the world.
name: History of the United States, Reconstruction to the Present
title: WCAS HISTORY 210-2-1 History of the United States, Reconstruction to the Present

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course will survey the history of the United States from the Reconstruction Era to the present. It will focus on several key themes, including the struggle to address social and economic inequality, the expansion of the state, economic achievements and dislocations, and the place of the United States in the world.

subject: HISTORY
